summary: A craftable enchanted sword with a modified silver sword texture. Enchantment includes 3 second soul trap, 10 fire damage to undead, 10 points of health absorb to dragons, 5 points of stamina absorb and banishes summoned daedra. Requires a book found in Sky Haven (on main blades room table) to be crafted. The book explains it all. I hope you enjoy
descriptionHtml: A craftable enchanted sword with a modified silver sword texture. Enchantment includes 3 second soul trap, 10 fire damage to undead, 10 points of health absorb to dragons, 5 points of stamina absorb and banishes summoned daedra. Requires a book found in Sky Haven (on main blades room table) to be crafted. The book explains it all. I hope you enjoy it. Let me know if you find anything wrong with it or think something should be altered. Please feel encouraged to endorse... its always nice to see another endorsement pop up. Happy slashing!
author: MidnightSon06
